member.name: T:SudokuTools.SudokuMethods
member.summary: A set of generic methods useful for a functioning Sudoku game.

member.name: M:SudokuTools.SudokuMethods.legalMove(System.Int32[0:,0:],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether a legal Sudoku move has been made for the given cell on the board. Note: Very efficient

member.name: M:SudokuTools.SudokuMethods.getValidMoves(System.Int32[0:,0:],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of all valid moves that could be made for the given cell on the board.

member.name: T:SudokuTools.SudokuBoardHelper
member.summary: Method container to access the generation and solving of sudoku boards/puzzles

member.name: M:SudokuTools.SudokuBoardHelper.generatePuzzle
member.summary: Generates a 2D array of size (9,9) with values meeting all rules of a standard Sudoku game. Uses LINQ statments for optimisation.

member.name: M:SudokuTools.SudokuBoardHelper.solvePuzzle(System.Int32[0:,0:])
member.summary: Fills the incomplete 2D array with values meeting all rules of a standard Sudoku game. Uses LINQ statments for optimisation.
